Klasse AnimalViewPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
gui.ShelterPanel
gui.animalview.AnimalViewPanel
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
GUIConstants, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible
public class AnimalViewPanel extends ShelterPanel
A panel for viewing and managing animal information. This panel allows users to create, edit, and view animal details, including name, birthdate, gender, type, room assignment, and additional notes. It also includes functionality for uploading images and associating animals with patrons.
Siehe auch:

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AnimalViewPanel

      public AnimalViewPanel()
      Constructs a new AnimalViewPanel. Initializes the layout, data access objects, file chooser, and UI components.

  • Methodendetails

    • initOutput

      private void initOutput()
      Initializes the output components, primarily the center panel for displaying animal details.

    • createCenterPanel

      private ShelterPanel createCenterPanel()
      Creates and configures the center panel of the layout, containing input fields and labels for animal data. Uses a GridBagLayout for precise component placement.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created ShelterPanel representing the center panel.

    • initInput

      private void initInput()
      Initializes the input components, specifically the button panel at the bottom of the view. This panel contains buttons for new, cancel, edit, save, and delete operations.

    • initLists

      private void initLists()
      Initializes the lists within the panel, including the main animal list on the left and the incident/examination lists on the right.

    • initSideList

      private void initSideList()
      Initializes the side list displaying animals that are not yet adopted. This list allows users to select animals for viewing and editing.

    • createRightPanel

      private ShelterPanel createRightPanel()
      Creates and configures the right panel, which contains the incident and examination panels. Uses a BoxLayout for vertical arrangement.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created ShelterPanel representing the right panel.

    • createIncidentPanel

      private ShelterPanel createIncidentPanel()
      Creates and configures the incident panel, including a header, a list to display incidents, and a button to add new incidents.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created ShelterPanel representing the incident panel.

    • createExaminationPanel

      private ShelterPanel createExaminationPanel()
      Creates and configures the examination panel, similar to the incident panel, including a header, a list for examinations, and a button to add new ones.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created ShelterPanel representing the examination panel.

    • fillForm

      public void fillForm()
      Fills the animal details form with the data of the currently selected animal. This method populates the text fields, combo boxes, radio buttons, and image panel with the information from the 'animal' object. It also refreshes the incident and examination lists.

    • saveAnimal

      public void saveAnimal()
      Saves the animal data entered in the form. This method retrieves the values from the input fields, sets them on the 'animal' object, validates the data, and then saves the animal using the DTOManager. It also refreshes the animal list, clears the form, and updates the button and form states.

    • selectAnimalById

      public void selectAnimalById(int id)
      Selects an animal in the list by its ID. This method iterates through the animal list model to find an animal with the matching ID and selects it in the list. This is used in roomsPanel to make a selection in the AnimalList there, be transferred to AnimalViewPanel
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the animal to select.

    • onAnimalListSelectionChanged

      private void onAnimalListSelectionChanged(ListSelectionEvent e)
      Handles the event when the selection in the animal list changes. This method retrieves the selected animal, fills the form with its details, and updates the button and form states.
      Parameter:
      e - The ListSelectionEvent object.

    • onNewIncidentButtonPressed

      private void onNewIncidentButtonPressed()
      Handles the event when the "New Incident" button is pressed. This method opens a dialog to create a new incident for the selected animal.

    • onNewExaminationButtonPressed

      private void onNewExaminationButtonPressed()
      Handles the event when the "New Examination" button is pressed. This method opens a dialog to create a new examination for the selected animal.

    • onAdoptionButtonPressed

      private void onAdoptionButtonPressed()
      Handles the event when the "Adopt" button is pressed. This method opens a dialog to handle the adoption process for the selected animal.

    • imagePathToByteArray

      public byte[] imagePathToByteArray(Path imagePath) throws IOException
      Converts an image from a Path to a byte array.
      Parameter:
      imagePath - The Path of the image file.
      Gibt zurück:
      A byte array representing the image data.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getPathFromFileChooser

      private Path getPathFromFileChooser()
      Opens a file chooser dialog to select an image file. Filters the file selection to only allow image files (jpg, png, bmp, jpeg).
      Gibt zurück:
      The Path of the selected image file, or null if no file is selected.

    • validateAnimal

      private boolean validateAnimal(AnimalDTO animalDTO)
      Validates the animal data before saving. Checks if all required fields are filled and valid.
      Parameter:
      animalDTO - The AnimalDTO object to validate.
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the animal data is valid, false otherwise.

    • getGenderFromRadio

      private int getGenderFromRadio()
      Gets the selected gender from the radio button group.
      Gibt zurück:
      The index of the selected gender radio button (0 for male, 1 for female, etc.), or -1 if no gender is selected.

    • setRadioFromGender

      private void setRadioFromGender()
      Sets the selected gender radio button based on the animal's gender.

    • clearForm

      public void clearForm()
      Clears the animal details form. Resets all input fields, combo boxes, radio buttons, and the image panel. Also clears the incident and examination lists and deselects any animal in the list.

    • selectComboBoxItemById

      private <T extends EntityDTO> void selectComboBoxItemById(JComboBox<T> comboBox, T entity)
      Selects an item in a combo box based on the ID of an entity. Iterates through the combo box items and selects the item whose ID matches the entity's ID.
      Typparameter:
      T - The type of the items in the combo box, which must extend EntityDTO.
      Parameter:
      comboBox - The combo box to search within.
      entity - The entity whose ID is used for selection.

    • refreshListModel

      public <T> void refreshListModel(DefaultListModel<T> model, ArrayList<T> newItems)
      Refreshes a list model with new items. Clears the existing model and adds all the new items.
      Typparameter:
      T - The type of the items in the list model.
      Parameter:
      model - The list model to refresh.
      newItems - The new items to add to the model.

    • refreshBoxModel

      public <T> void refreshBoxModel(DefaultComboBoxModel<T> model, ArrayList<T> newItems)
      Refreshes a combo box model with new items. Removes all existing elements and adds the new items.
      Typparameter:
      T - The type of the items in the combo box model.
      Parameter:
      model - The combo box model to refresh.
      newItems - The new items to add to the model.

    • onNewButtonPressed

      private void onNewButtonPressed()
      Handles the "New" button press. Clears the form, sets the mode to create new animal, and updates the button and form states.

    • onCancelButtonPressed

      private void onCancelButtonPressed()
      Handles the "Cancel" button press. Resets the mode to neither edit nor create, and updates button and form states.

    • onEditButtonPressed

      private void onEditButtonPressed()
      Handles the "Edit" button press. Sets the mode to edit existing animal, and updates button and form states.

    • onUploadImageButtonPressed

      private void onUploadImageButtonPressed()
      Handles the "Upload Image" button press. Opens a file chooser to select an image, converts it to a byte array, sets it to the animal object and updates the image panel.

    • changeFormState

      private void changeFormState(AnimalViewPanel.Mode mode)
      Changes the state of the form components (text fields, combo boxes, buttons etc.) based on the mode being passed in.
      Parameter:
      mode - The mode determining the state of each control.
